about.description: Experienced developer from Riga, Latvia. Passionate about creating user friendly web applications. Eager learner and active participant in tech communities. Seeking opportunities to apply skills and contribute to innovative projects.

experience.title: Experience
experience.description: Since 2021, I've gained programming experience through olympiads, projects, freelancing, and coding challenges. These experiences improved my problem-solving skills and expanded my tech knowledge. I am ready to make an effective contribution to the future of programming.

tasker.description: A powerful task management system to boost team productivity
